notes: regular -are verb; also used reflexively as 'addolorarsi'
example_sentence_english: I do not want to sadden anyone.
You are saddening everyone.

notes: past participle; regular root; used with auxiliary avere
example_sentence_english: I saddened him unintentionally.

notes: past participle; regular root; used with auxiliary avere
example_sentence_english: I saddened her with those words.

notes: past participle; regular root; used with auxiliary avere
example_sentence_italian: Li ho addolorati con la mia scelta.
example_sentence_english: I saddened them with my choice.

notes: past participle; regular root; used with auxiliary avere
example_sentence_italian: Le ho addolorate con la notizia.
example_sentence_english: I saddened them with the news.
I sadden you unintentionally.
You do not sadden the child.
This saddens everyone.
We do not sadden our friends.

example_sentence_italian: Per favore non addolorate i bambini.
example_sentence_english: Please do not sadden the children.
His words sadden many.

example_sentence_italian: Da giovane addoloravo spesso mia madre.
example_sentence_english: When I was young I often saddened my mother.
You were not saddening anyone on purpose.

translation_english: he was saddening/she was saddening/you (formal) were saddening
example_sentence_english: The situation was saddening the city.

example_sentence_italian: Addoloravamo i nonni con le discussioni.
example_sentence_english: We were saddening our grandparents with the arguments.
You were often saddening your fans.
The news was saddening everyone.
I have saddened my parents.
You have saddened your sister.

translation_english: he has saddened/she has saddened/you (formal) have saddened
notes: used with auxiliary avere; also used as formal 'Lei'
example_sentence_italian: Ha addolorato molti con quelle parole.
example_sentence_english: He has saddened many with those words.
We have saddened the team.
You have saddened many friends.

example_sentence_italian: Hanno addolorato tutti con la decisione.
example_sentence_english: They have saddened everyone with the decision.
